content: double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 skip treble_crochet 2 times count totals total chain spaces are included in the st count corner chain spaces are not included in the total example counts 48 double_crochet 36 fptr 8 chain-2 space 4 chain-2 corner space 100 total/25 per side special instructions instructions for all rounds start with a standing stitch and end with an invisible join to 2nd st of round and fasten_off if not changing colors you can opt to finish the previous round with a slip_stitch join and use the appropriate chain or chainless starting stitch to begin the next round keep in mind that if you choose the slip stitch end the chain or chainless starting stitch will replace the first standing st of the round ✔️ navigate between written instructions stitch definitions videos and pictures by clicking on the corresponding links for example you can click here to see a picture of the square and then click on the picture to return to the link to view the yarns and colors used click here then click on the yarns and colors used link to return please be aware that some mobile phone users may experience difficulties round 1 colorway 1 pewter a / colorway 2 papaya a in double magic_ring chain 3 counts as first double_crochet of round into a double magic_ring 11 double_crochet cut yarn invisible join to first true double_crochet fasten_off counts 12 double_crochet 12 total round 2 colorway 1 red clay b / colorway 2 curry b starting in any double_crochet tr2tog in 1st and 3rd double_crochet chain 2 keeping previously worked tr2tog behind work tr2tog in 2nd worked double_crochet and 4th unworked double_crochet chain 2 keeping previously worked tr2tog behind work tr2tog in 3rd worked double_crochet and 5th unworked double_crochet chain 2 9 times keeping previously worked tr2tog behind work 1st leg of tr2tog in 12th worked double_crochet of round 1 and work 2nd leg of tr2tog in 2nd worked double_crochet of round 1 and behind of 1st worked tr2tog chain 2 cut yarn invisible join counts 12 tr2tog 12 chain-2 space 36 total this overlapping decrease video explains st placement in this round instead of working a tr2tog and chain 2 the video demonstrates working a decrease and chain 1 the video also works the decrease in front of the previous decrease instead of behind it round 3 colorway 1 taupe c / colorway 2 dark denim c starting in any chain-2 space * 4 double_crochet in chain-2 space chain 2 fpdc around next tr2tog repeat from * around cut yarn invisible join counts 48 double_crochet 12 fpdc 12 chain-2 space 84 total madux james square a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2023 page 3 of 14 round 4 colorway 1 med burgundy d / colorway 2 deep teal d starting in any chain-2 space * 4 double_crochet in chain-2 space fpdc around next fpdc chain 1 skip next 4 double_crochet repeat from * around cut yarn invisible join counts
